summary: Adds PostgreSQL‑specific extensions to Django, integrating custom functions, indexes, lookups, migration operations, full‑text search utilities, signal handling, and validators so that advanced PostgreSQL features can be used seamlessly through the Django ORM.
business_intent: Enable Django developers to leverage PostgreSQL advanced data types and extensions—such as GIN indexes, hstore, citext, trigram, unaccent, range types, and full‑text search—within the ORM and migration framework, providing validation and automatic connection handling.
